TRAILERS

by
July 22, 2025
Source: YouTube

"For the price of one movie ticket, and you can help rescue a comedy. And in the process, you'll get to share a smile, a laugh, and the occasional groan with the people in your very own community. Right now there's a comedy movie that needs you..." Ha ha. Paramount has debuted a funny fake (or is it?) PSA video for The Naked Gun movie, directed by the comedy mastermind Akiva Schaffer. The video features Liam Neeson trying to convince you to buy a ticket and help save comedies in Hollywood because less & less of them are being made nowadays. (It's true!) "A Naked Gun for the modern age — only in theatres August 1st." Watch the full trailer here. Liam Neeson stars in this as Lt. Frank Drebin Jr., son of the original Frank Drebin, played by comedy maestro Leslie Nielsen. Joining the case are Pamela Anderson, Paul Walter Hauser, CCH Pounder, Kevin Durand, Cody Rhodes, Liza Koshy, Eddie Yu, & Danny Huston. The three original Naked Gun movies are some of the funniest ever made – for real. This PSA video is both a joke and also actually serious – not many good comedies ever open in theaters anymore. So please help save comedy.

Here's the "Save Comedy" PSA featurette for Akiva Schaffer's comedy The Naked Gun, from YouTube:

You can rewatch the teaser for Schaffer's The Naked Gun reboot right here and the full official trailer here.

Only one man has the particular set of skills... to lead Police Squad and save the world! Lt. Frank Drebin Jr. (Liam Neeson) follows in his father's footsteps in The Naked Gun. Based off the widely popular comedy franchise The Naked Gun and television series "Police Squad!" by Jim Abrahams and David Zucker and Jerry Zucker. The Naked Gun remake is directed by the comedy mastermind Akiva Schaffer, director of the movies Hot Rod, The Watch, and Chip 'n Dale: Rescue Rangers previously, plus lots of work for "SNL" and Lonely Island. The screenplay is written by Dan Gregor & Doug Mand & Akiva Schaffer; based on the The Naked Gun movies and "Police Squad!" series. It's produced by Seth MacFarlane, Erica Huggins. Made by Domain Entertainment and A Fuzzy Door Productions. Paramount will debut Schaffer's The Naked Gun movie in theaters nationwide starting August 1st, 2025 this summer. Who's down for this? Funny or not?
